name: Beef Honey onion
description: This Beef Honey Onion recipe is perfectly tailored for those adhering to a high-protein and low-carb diet, while also being a healthified version of a beloved classic. Seasoned with a hint of sweetness from honey and the robust flavors of black pepper and oyster sauce, it's an enticing dish for anyone looking to maintain a healthy lifestyle without sacrificing taste.
recipeIngredient: 1  tsp ground (2.3 g), Black Pepper - Ground

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine the beef sukiyaki meat with honey, salt, ground black pepper, and oyster sauce. Let it marinate for at least 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan over medium heat, saut√© the sliced onion until translucent and slightly caramelized, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the marinated beef to the pan and cook until the beef is fully cooked and the sauce has thickened, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
